trailingComments.value:
*
 * Create a pointwise function of two arguments
 * 
 * @export
 * @param {Function} fun
 * @returns {Function}
 * @example 
 * 
 * function _add (x, y) {
 *   return x + y
 * }
 * const add = pointwise(_add)
 * add(1, 2)                                // 3
 * add([1, 2], [1, 2])                      // [2, 4]
 * add([[1, 2], [1, 2]], [[1, 2], [1, 2]])  //[[2, 4], [2, 4]]

arguments.value: mathlab.pointwise: dimension of given array should <= 2
